name: Mini Soccer Star 2022
description:
Welcome to the MINI SOCCER STAR 2022!

Play the brand new soccer game Mini Soccer Star and enjoy the real and immersive soccer experience.

You will play as a young soccer player and experience a legendary career.

You only need the simplest controls to complete wonderful shooting and passing, and the physics-based football simulation system will bring you an amazing game experience.

There are tons of real teams and leagues/cups. You can join the most famous clubs and also help your country win the world championship. Eventually, become a legendary soccer star.

Game Features:
* You can play offline.
* Lots of real teams and league/cups.
* Simulate the career of a soccer player.
* You can even play goalkeeper.
* Advanced animation system and AI.
* Super simple controls - just drag and tap.
* Addictive soccer training challenges.
* Lots of player customization options.
* Save your great goals anytime.
* Stylized game graphics.
* Global Achievements and leaderboards.

The game supports multiple languages including English, Portuguese, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Turkish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, and Indonesian.

Download MINI SOCCER STAR for free and be the mini soccer star!
